params.minConfirmations: The minimum number of confirmations required.
params.proof: The Merkle proof of the transaction's inclusion.
params.sourceChain: The source chain ID of the transaction.

returns._0: bool True if the proof is valid and has sufficient confirmations.

verifyAttestation(bytes32,uint256,bytes,.notice: Verifies a data root attestation from the Blobstream contract.
